DOC.brief_summary: This study assess impact prevention sarcopenia take cetylpyridinium chloride target patient presarcopenia age 60 .
DOC.detailed_description: 65 people meet inclusion criterion screen test assign one five group randomization . They take medication two week double-blind . Four study group take cetylpyridinium chloride 1.5mg , 3mg , 4.5mg 6mg daily two week . Control group take placebo period . The main outcome variable measure compare respectively baseline , immediately dose end two week end administration . Finally cetylpyridinium chloride verify whether preventive effect sarcopenia set appropriate dose .
DOC.criteria: Presarcopenia A . Reduced skeletal muscle mass ( ASM/height2 ) M < 7.0kg/m2 , F < 5.7kg/m2 B . Normal grip strength M ≥ 26kg , F ≥ 18kg C. Normal physical performance Gait speed > 0.8m/s Community dwell History stroke spinal cord injury Artificial joint Acute disease unstable chronic disease Phenylketonuria History myocardiac infarction Allergic contact dermatitis History drug/alcohol addiction , habitual smoker
